definition: not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
(negative prefix)/not/no
to hear/news/well-known/famous/reputation/fame/to smell/to sniff at
surname Wen
(negative prefix)/not/no
to ask

sentences.english: Do you live in luxury without caring for the needy?
sentences.chinese: 你是否生活奢侈，却对有需要的人不闻不问？

sentences.english: He shut his ears to all appeals for help.
sentences.chinese: 他对于一切求助的呼声都不闻不问。

sentences.english: I can't ignore your rudeness any longer.
sentences.chinese: 对于你的粗暴无礼，我再也不能不闻不问了。

sentences.english: People with brown skins are next door to invisible.
sentences.chinese: 这些棕色人种对邻居也是不闻不问。

sentences.english: We can't remain indifferent when any comrade is in difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 同志们有困难我们不能不闻不问。

sentences.english: Government should take it hard with the Ukrainian part.
sentences.chinese: 印度政府不闻不问的，印度人成为了软柿子。

definition: to pay no heed to (idiom)/to ignore/to brush aside
to completely ignore (idiom)/to pay no attention to/not to be in the least concerned about
not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
aloof/indifferent/unconcerned
to turn a blind eye to
to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
to take a laissez-faire attitude
to turn a blind eye to/to ignore
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
to play deaf-mute
to block one's ears and not listen (idiom); to turn a deaf ear
to refuse to acknowledge/to pay no attention to/to take no notice of/to ignore
to turn a blind eye
pinyin: zheng1 yi1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 zhi1 yan3

definition: not to mention (idiom); to say not one word/fig. to omit mention (of a non-person or embarrassing topic)/to censor
to set to one side and ignore (idiom); quite indifferent/cold and uncaring
to let sb do whatever they want/to indulge/to give free reins to/to let things slide/to drift aimlessly/laissez-faire
